# aci_vmm_domain #

Manages ACI VMM Domain


  !> This resource has been migrated to the terraform plugin protocol version 6, refer to the [migration guide](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/guides/migration) for more details and implications for already managed resources.

## API Information ##

* Class: [vmmDomP](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/vmmDomP/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.0(1e) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/vmmp-{vendor}/dom-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Virtual Networking -> Provider -> Domain`

## Example Usage ##

The configuration snippet below creates a VMM Domain with only required attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_vmm_domain" "example" {
  parent_dn = "uni/vmmp-VMware"
  name      = "test_name"
}

```
The configuration snippet below shows all possible attributes of the VMM Domain.

!> This example might not be valid configuration and is only used to show all possible attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_vmm_domain" "full_example" {
  parent_dn                        = "uni/vmmp-VMware"
  access_mode                      = "read-only"
  annotation                       = "annotation"
  arp_learning                     = ""
  ave_time_out                     = "30"
  configure_infra_port_groups      = "no"
  endpoint_data_path_verification  = "epDpVerify"
  custom_switch_name               = ""
  delimiter                        = "@"
  enable_ave_mode                  = "no"
  enable_tag_collection            = "no"

    annotations = [
      {
        key   = "key_0"

      }
    ]

        key   = "key_0"
        value = "value_1"

    ]
```

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `parent_dn` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the parent object, possible resources:
  - The distinguished name (DN) of classes below can be used but currently there is no available resource for it:
    - [vmmProvP](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/vmmProvP/overview)

          1. uni/vmmp-CloudFoundry
          2. uni/vmmp-Kubernetes
          3. uni/vmmp-Microsoft
          4. uni/vmmp-Nutanix
          5. uni/vmmp-OpenShift
          6. uni/vmmp-OpenStack
          7. uni/vmmp-Redhat
          8. uni/vmmp-VMware
* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the VMM Domain object.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the VMM Domain object.

### Optional ###

* `access_mode` (accessMode) - (string) The access mode of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.1(1i) and later.
  - Default: `"read-write"`
  - Valid Values: `"read-only"`, `"read-write"`.
* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  - Default: `"orchestrator:terraform"`
* `arp_learning` (arpLearning) - (string) Enable ARP learning for the the VMM Domain object, this attribute is only applicable for Application Virtual Switch (AVS). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.1(1i) and later.
  - Default: `"disabled"`
  - Valid Values: `""`, `"disabled"`, `"enabled"`.
* `ave_time_out` (aveTimeOut) - (string) The timeout in seconds that the Cisco ACI Virtual Edge (AVE), the virtual switch for ACI, can remain in a non-working state before vCenter takes action. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(10e) to 3.2(10g), 3.2(3n) and later.
  - Default: `"30"`
* `configure_infra_port_groups` (configInfraPg) - (string) Configure port groups for the virtual APIC. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 4.0(1h) and later.
  - Default: `"no"`
  - Valid Values: `"no"`, `"yes"`.
* `endpoint_data_path_verification` (ctrlKnob) - (string) This mechanism allows disabling endpoint verification, prevents the un-deployment of an EPG while processing an endpoint detach when the fabric is still receiving traffic for the endpoint. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.0(1k) and later.
  - Default: `"epDpVerify"`
  - Valid Values: `"epDpVerify"`, `"none"`.
* `custom_switch_name` (customSwitchName) - (string) The custom vSwitch name. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 6.0(3d) and later.
* `delimiter` (delimiter) - (string) The delimiter of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.0(1m) and later.
* `enable_ave_mode` (enableAVE) - (string) Enable Cisco ACI Virtual Edge (AVE) mode on the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.1(1i) and later.
  - Default: `"no"`
  - Valid Values: `"no"`, `"yes"`.
* `enable_tag_collection` (enableTag) - (string) Enable Tag data retrieval for the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(10e) to 3.2(10g), 3.2(4d) and later.
  - Default: `"no"`
  - Valid Values: `"no"`, `"yes"`.
* `enable_vm_folder_data_retrieval` (enableVmFolder) - (string) Enable VM Folder data retrieval for the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(10e) to 3.2(10g), 3.2(6i) to 3.2(9h), 4.1(2g) and later.
  - Default: `"no"`
  - Valid Values: `"no"`, `"yes"`.
* `encapsulation_mode` (encapMode) - (string) The encapsulation mode of the VMM Domain object. When default_encapsulation_mode is not specified, the encapsulation_mode is automatically set based on the encapsulation blocks associated with the domain. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 1.2(1i) and later.
  - Default: `"unknown"`
  - Valid Values: `"ivxlan"`, `"unknown"`, `"vlan"`, `"vxlan"`.
* `switching_enforcement_preference` (enfPref) - (string) The switching enforcement preference of the VMM Domain object. This determines whether switching is done within the virtual switch (Local Switching) or whether all switched traffic must go through the fabric (No Local Switching).
  - Default: `"hw"`
  - Valid Values: `"hw"`, `"sw"`, `"unknown"`.
* `endpoint_inventory_type` (epInventoryType) - (string) The endpoint inventory type of the VMM Domain object. When set to on-link type the inventory will contain all endpoints that share a fabric uplink. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.1(2p) and later.
  - Default: `"on-link"`
  - Valid Values: `"none"`, `"on-link"`.
* `endpoint_retention_time` (epRetTime) - (string) The endpoint retention time of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.0(1k) and later.
  - Default: `"0"`
* `host_availability_assurance` (hvAvailMonitor) - (string) Enable host availability assurance, which creates a vSphere Proactive HA provider object that resides in VMware vCenter. The object enables VMware vCenter to quarantine a host with a nonworking Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure Virtual Edge and move its VMs. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(10e) to 3.2(10g), 3.2(3n) and later.
  - Default: `"no"`
  - Valid Values: `"no"`, `"yes"`.
* `multicast_address` (mcastAddr) - (string) The multicast address of the VMM Domain object.
* `switch_type` (mode) - (string) The switch type of the VMM Domain object.
  - Default: `"default"`
  - Valid Values: `"cf"`, `"default"`, `"k8s"`, `"n1kv"`, `"nsx"`, `"nutanix_pc"`, `"nutanix_pe"`, `"openshift"`, `"ovs"`, `"rancher"`, `"rhev"`, `"unknown"`.
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `owner_key` (ownerKey) - (string) The key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
* `owner_tag` (ownerTag) - (string) A tag for enabling clients to add their own data. For example, to indicate who created this object.
* `default_encapsulation_mode` (prefEncapMode) - (string) The default encapsulation mode of the VMM Domain object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.1(1h) and later.
  - Default: `"unspecified"`
  - Valid Values: `"unspecified"`, `"vlan"`, `"vxlan"`.
* `relation_to_ip_address_pool` - (map) A map of Relation To IP Address Pool (ACI object [infraRsVipAddrNs](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/infraRsVipAddrNs/overview)) pointing to IP Address Pool (ACI Object [fvnsAddrInst](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsAddrInst/overview)) which can be configured using the [aci_ip_address_pool](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/ip_address_pool) resource.
  #### Optional ####
    
    * `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the Relation To IP Address Pool object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
      - Default: `"orchestrator:terraform"`
    * `target_dn` (tDn) - (string) The distinguished name of the target.
    * `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). Annotations can also be configured using a separate [aci_annotation](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/annotation) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
      #### Required ####
  
        * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
        * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
    * `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). Tags can also be configured using a separate [aci_tag](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/tag) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
      #### Required ####
  
        * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
        * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `relation_to_vlan_pool` - (map) A map of Relation To Vlan Pool (ACI object [infraRsVlanNs](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/infraRsVlanNs/overview)) pointing to Vlan Pool (ACI Object [fvnsVlanInstP](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsVlanInstP/overview)) which can be configured using the [aci_vlan_pool](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/vlan_pool) resource.
  #### Optional ####
    
    * `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the Relation To Vlan Pool object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
      - Default: `"orchestrator:terraform"`
    * `target_dn` (tDn) - (string) The distinguished name of the target.
    * `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). Annotations can also be configured using a separate [aci_annotation](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/annotation) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
      #### Required ####

        * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.

## Importing

An existing VMM Domain can be [imported](https://www.terraform.io/docs/import/index.html) into this resource with its distinguished name (DN), via the following command:

```
terraform import aci_vmm_domain.example uni/vmmp-{vendor}/dom-{name}
```

Starting in Terraform version 1.5, an existing VMM Domain can be imported
using [import blocks](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) via the following configuration:

```
import {
  id = "uni/vmmp-{vendor}/dom-{name}"
  to = aci_vmm_domain.example
}
```

## Child Resources
  
  - [aci_vmm_credential](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/vmm_credential)
  - [aci_vswitch_policy](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/vswitch_policy)
